author: Thomas Jefferson
quote: Do you want to know who you are? Don't ask. Act! Action will delineate and define you.

author: Chinese Proverb
quote: It is not the knowing that is difficult, but the doing.

author: William James
quote: When you have to make a choice and don't make it, that is in itself a choice.

author: Celestine Chua
quote: The degree of responsibility you take for your life determines how much change you can create in it.

author: Ayn Rand
quote: If you don't know, the thing to do is not to get scared, but to learn.

author: Eric Hoffer
quote: Far more crucial than what we know or do not know is what we do not want to know.

author: Vince Lombardi
quote: The only place success comes before work is in the dictionary.

author: Samuel Beckett
quote: Words are the clothes thoughts wear.

author: Benjamin Franklin
quote: Either write something worth reading or do something worth writing.

author: Woody Allen
quote: If you want to make God laugh, tell him about your plans.

author: Charlie Chaplin
quote: Life can be wonderful if you're not afraid of it.

author: Dan Brown
quote: Men go to far greater lengths to avoid what they fear than to obtain what they desire.

author: Gilbert Chesterton
quote: The traveler sees what he sees. The tourist sees what he has come to see.

author: Zen Proverb
quote: Trying to define yourself is like trying to bite your own teeth.

author: Criss Jami
quote: A fear of weakness only strengthens weakness.

author: Maxime Lagace
quote: Difficult and meaningful will always bring more satisfaction than easy and meaningless.

author: Franz Kafka
quote: You are free, and that is why you are lost.

author: Niccolo Machiavelli
quote: He who wishes to be obeyed must know how to command.

author: Simon Sinek
quote: The goal is not to be perfect by the end, the goal is to be better today.

author: Jim Rohn
quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.

author: Stephen King
quote: You can, you should, and if you're brave enough to start, you will.

author: Anne Frank
quote: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.

author: John Wooden
quote: Just do the best you can. No one can do more than that.

author: Sun Tzu
quote: A leader leads by example, not by force.

author: C. Sean McGee
quote: If you are ever the smartest person in the room, you are in the wrong room.

author: Aristotle
quote: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.

author: Walt Whitman
quote: Re-examine all that you have been told... dismiss that which insults your soul.

author: Ming-Dao Deng
quote: It is up to each of us to sing as we feel moved by the overall song of life.

author: Amelia Earhart
quote: Never do things others can do and will do if there are things others cannot do or will not do.

author: Meister Eckhart
quote: Only the hand that erases can write the true thing.

author: Kahlil Gibran
quote: Yesterday is but today's memory, tomorrow is today's dream.

author: John Lennon
quote: If you want peace, you won't get it with violence.

author: Euripides
quote: Question everything. Learn something. Answer nothing.

author: Zen Proverb
quote: Live calmly. The time will come when the flowers bloom by themselves.

author: Les Brown
quote: Most people fail in life not because they aim too high and miss, but because they aim too low and hit.

author: Unknown
quote: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.

author: Brian Tracy
quote: 20 percent of your activities will account for 80 percent of your results.

author: Josh Waitzkin
quote: No matter how much preparation we do, in the real tests of our lives, we'll be in unfamiliar terrain.

author: Criss Jami
quote: The biggest challenge after success is shutting up about it.

author: Unknown
quote: If you put yourself in a position where you have to stretch outside your comfort zone, then you are forced to expand your consciousness.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: Nothing will work unless you do.

author: Lolly Daskal
quote: Many people spend more time looking at their failures than focusing on their successes.

author: Norman Vincent Peale
quote: Imagination is the true magic carpet.

author: Napoleon Hill
quote: Deliberately seek the company of people who influence you to think and act on building the life you desire.

author: Aristophanes
quote: Wise people, even though all laws were abolished, would still lead the same life.

author: Publilius Syrus
quote: He who violates another's honor loses his own.

author: Dalai Lama
quote: Judge your success by what you had to give up in order to get it.

author: Lao Tzu
quote: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.

author: Charlie Chaplin
quote: The deeper the truth in a creative work, the longer it will live.

author: St. Jerome
quote: Catch, then, O catch the transient hour; Improve each moment as it flies!

author: Jonathan Swift
quote: Health is the greatest of all possessions.

author: Norman Vincent Peale
quote: A vital part of the happiness formula is self-discipline. Whoever conquers himself knows deep happiness that fills the heart with joy.

author: Carol Burnett
quote: Words, once they are printed, have a life of their own.

author: Chinese Proverb
quote: If you are patient in one moment of anger, you will escape a hundred days of sorrow.

author: Thomas Jefferson
quote: How much pain they have cost us, the evils which have never happened.

author: Lao Tzu
quote: Empty yourself of everything - let the mind become still.

author: Robert F. Kennedy
quote: The future is not a gift. It is an achievement.

author: C. Sean McGee
quote: Respect is earned by effort not age, all things age without effort.

author: Hans Christian Andersen
quote: The sun shines upon good and bad alike.

author: Kabir
quote: If you cannot understand something, then you have understood it incorrectly.

author: Og Mandino
quote: Forget mistakes. Forget failure. Forget everything except what you are going to do now and do it. Today is your lucky day!

author: Sun Tzu
quote: To know your Enemy, you must become your Enemy.

author: Deepak Chopra
quote: There are no accidents... there is only some purpose that we haven't yet understood.

author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.

author: Zhuangzi
quote: Happiness is the absence of the striving for happiness.

author: Carlos Ruiz Zafon
quote: Human beings believe just as they breathe - in order to survive.

author: Winston Churchill
quote: Continuous effort - not strength or intelligence - is the key to unlocking our potential.

author: Lao Tzu
quote: The best fighter is never angry.

author: Lolly Daskal
quote: When you stop questioning, you stop learning.

author: Benjamin Franklin
quote: You may delay, but time will not.

author: James Matthew Barrie
quote: Dreams do come true, if we only wish hard enough, You can have anything in life if you will sacrifice everything else for it.

author: Franz Kafka
quote: My guiding principle is this: Guilt is never to be doubted.

author: W.P. Kinsella
quote: Success is getting what you want, happiness is wanting what you get.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: Be Brave and Take Risks: You need to have faith in yourself. Be brave and take risks. You don't have to have it all figured out to move forward.

author: Sigmund Freud
quote: Being entirely honest with oneself is a good exercise.

author: Ming-Dao Deng
quote: If we know how to adapt, we end up being superior.

author: Jack Butcher
quote: How to get more opportunity: Create more opportunity for others.

author: Alexandre Dumas
quote: For all evils there are two remedies - time and silence.

author: Buddha
quote: Before enlightenment; chop wood, carry water. After enlightenment; chop wood, carry water.

author: W. Clement Stone
quote: Definiteness of purpose is the starting point of all achievement.

author: Neil Barringham
quote: The grass is greener where you water it.

author: Candice Carpenter
quote: Success is about creating value.

author: Dogen
quote: A fool sees himself as another, but a wise man sees others as himself.

author: Norman Vincent Peale
quote: The secret of life isn't what happens to you, but what you do with what happens to you.

author: Zen Proverb
quote: If you've made a mistake, it's better just to laugh at it.

author: Denis Waitley
quote: Expect the best, plan for the worst, and prepare to be surprised.

author: Alfred Adler
quote: Meanings are not determined by situations, but we determine ourselves by the meanings we give to situations.

author: Voltaire
quote: Common sense is not so common.

author: Alexander Graham Bell
quote: Ideas do not reach perfection in a day, no matter how much study is put upon them.

author: Zig Ziglar
quote: The chief cause of failure and unhappiness is trading what you want most for what you want right now.

author: Zig Ziglar
quote: The major difference between the big shot and the little shot is the big shot is just a little shot who kept on shooting.

author: T.S. Eliot
quote: What do we live for if not to make life less difficult for each other?

author: Yoko Ono
quote: You change the world by being yourself.

author: Zen Proverb
quote: Throughout this life, you can never be certain of living long enough to take another breath.

author: Jack Butcher
quote: Productize your perspective.

author: Estee Lauder
quote: Projecting your mind into a successful situation is the most powerful means to achieve goals.

author: Thich Nhat Hanh
quote: Everything is in your own heart.

author: Lolly Daskal
quote: Believe you can and you will be halfway there.

author: Beverly Sills
quote: In youth we run into difficulties. In old age difficulties run into us.

author: William James
quote: Genius, in truth, means little more than the faculty of perceiving in an unhabitual way.

author: Henry David Thoreau
quote: Goodness is the only investment that never fails.

author: Unknown
quote: How you think is as important as as what you think.

author: Sun Tzu
quote: If you are far from the enemy, make him believe you are near.

author: Les Brown
quote: You must find the place inside yourself where nothing is impossible.

author: Seneca
quote: Difficulties strengthen the mind, as labor does the body.

author: Amelia Earhart
quote: A single act of kindness throws out roots in all directions, and the roots spring up and make new trees.

author: C. Sean McGee
quote: Only when one allows themself the right to die, do they then give yourself the permission to live.

author: Criss Jami
quote: If you build the guts to do something, anything, then you better save enough to face the consequences.

author: Carol Burnett
quote: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.

author: Maxime Lagace
quote: Plants grow weak without wind.

author: Ayn Rand
quote: The businessman's tool is value.

author: Alexandre Dumas
quote: The merit of all things lies in their difficulty.

author: Naval Ravikant
quote: The first rule of handling conflict is don't hang around people who are constantly engaging in conflict.

author: Publilius Syrus
quote: No man is happy unless he believes he is.

author: Kamal Ravikant
quote: We don't stumble accidentally into an amazing life. It takes decision, a commitment to consistently work on ourselves.

author: Unknown
quote: People think about what they don't want and attract more of the same.

author: Ayn Rand
quote: Wealth is the product of man's capacity to think.

author: Brian Tracy
quote: People with clear, written goals, accomplish far more in a shorter period of time than people without them could ever imagine.

author: Jim Rohn
quote: Work harder on yourself than you do on your job.

author: Eckhart Tolle
quote: It is not uncommon for people to spend their whole life waiting to start living.

author: Christopher McCandless
quote: Just get out and do it. You will be very, very glad that you did.

author: Dalai Lama
quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.

author: Gilbert Chesterton
quote: Without the rain there would be no rainbow.

author: W.P. Kinsella
quote: Heroes don't need to talk about what they did.

author: Beverly Sills
quote: There are no shortcuts to any place worth going.

author: Og Mandino
quote: Today will never happen again. Don't waste it with a false start or no start at all.

author: Wayne Dyer
quote: Peace is the result of retraining your mind to process life as it is, rather than as you think it should be.

author: Les Brown
quote: If you don't program yourself, life will program you.

author: Aristotle
quote: He who cannot be a good follower cannot be a good leader.

author: Maxime Lagace
quote: Wherever you are, it's the place you need to be.

author: Stephen King
quote: Amateurs sit and wait for inspiration, the rest of us just get up and got to work.

author: William Faulkner
quote: Given the choice between the experience of pain and nothing, I would choose pain.

author: Wayne Dyer
quote: You don't need to be better than anyone else, you just need to be better than you used to be.

author: John Carmack
quote: Focus is a matter of deciding what things you're not going to do.

author: Brian Tracy
quote: Leaders think and talk about solutions. Followers think and talk about the problems.

author: Deepak Chopra
quote: What keeps life fascinating is the constant creativity of the soul.

author: Naval Ravikant
quote: If you try to micromanage yourself all you're going to do is make yourself miserable.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: It's your life; you don't need someone's permission to live the life you want. Be brave to live from your heart.

author: Lin Yutang
quote: The wisdom of life consists in the elimination of the nonessentials.

author: Honore de Balzac
quote: Our greatest fears lie in anticipation.

author: Betty White
quote: Don't take yourself too seriously, pretty soon you can find the humor in our everyday lives.

author: Sun Tzu
quote: Even the finest sword plunged into salt water will eventually rust.

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: The final mystery is oneself.

author: Sathya Sai Baba
quote: Start the day with love, spend the day with love, fill the day with love and end the day with love.

author: Deepam Chaterjee
quote: What have you done today to make someone else happy?

author: Theodore Roosevelt
quote: People don't care how much you know until they know how much you care.

author: Tony Robbins
quote: The more rejection you get, the better you are, the more you've learned, the closer you are to your outcome.

author: Mary Engelbreit
quote: If you don't like something change it; if you can't change it, change the way you think about it.

author: Mother Teresa
quote: Be happy in the moment, that's enough. Each moment is all we need, not more.

author: Alfred Adler
quote: It is well known that those who do not trust themselves never trust others.

author: Steve Maraboli
quote: It only takes a split second to smile and forget, yet to someone that needed it, it can last a lifetime.

author: Honore de Balzac
quote: Life is simply what our feelings do to us.

author: Sydney Smith
quote: Life is to be fortified by many friendships. To love, and to be loved, is the greatest happiness of existence.

author: Aristotle
quote: Through discipline comes freedom.

author: William Faulkner
quote: Never be afraid to raise your voice for honesty and truth and compassion against injustice and lying and greed.

author: Colin Powell
quote: Remain calm. Be kind.

author: Celestine Chua
quote: To create more positive results in your life, replace 'if only' with 'next time'.

author: Benjamin Franklin
quote: We are all born ignorant, but one must work hard to remain stupid.

author: Seneca
quote: Throw me to the wolves and I will return leading the pack.

author: Elbert Hubbard
quote: Genius is the ability to act rightly without precedent - the power to do the right thing the first time.

author: Napoleon Hill
quote: Life reflects your own thoughts back to you.

author: Jeffrey Gitomer
quote: You don't earn loyalty in a day. You earn loyalty day-by-day.

author: Sun Tzu
quote: Supreme excellence consists of breaking the enemy's resistance without fighting.

author: Herman Melville
quote: I know not all that may be coming, but be it what it will, I'll go to it laughing.

author: Napoleon Hill
quote: No one ever is defeated until defeat has been accepted as a reality.

author: G.I. Gurdjieff
quote: Awakening is possible only for those who seek it and want it.

author: Thomas Jefferson
quote: He who permits himself to tell a lie once, finds it much easier to do it the second time.

author: Peter Drucker
quote: Until we can manage time, we can manage nothing else.

author: Bob Dylan
quote: When you've got nothing, you've got nothing to lose.

author: Zig Ziglar
quote: Rich people have small TVs and big libraries, and poor people have small libraries and big TVs.

author: Stephen King
quote: When you are talented you do it whatever it is until your fingers bleed or your eyes are ready to fall out of your head.

author: Kamal Ravikant
quote: Sometimes, the only way to evolve is to open ourselves fully.

author: Richard Bach
quote: Here is the test to find whether your mission on earth is finished. If you're alive, it isn't.

author: Thomas Jefferson
quote: Take care of your cents: dollars will take care of themselves.

author: James Cameron
quote: Hope is not a strategy. Luck is not a factor. Fear is not an option.

author: Sydney Smith
quote: Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off your goals.

author: Sathya Sai Baba
quote: Before you speak, ask yourself, is it kind, is it necessary, is it true, does it improve the silence?

author: Jack Kerouac
quote: Live, travel, adventure, bless, and don't be sorry.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: Life becomes easier and more beautiful when we can see the good in other people.

author: Aristophanes
quote: Love is merely the name for the desire and pursuit of the whole.

author: D. H. Lawrence
quote: Life is a traveling to the edge of knowledge, then a leap taken.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: Do not fear failure but rather fear not trying.

author: Alexander Graham Bell
quote: Before anything else, preparation is the key to success.

author: Dalai Lama
quote: Remember that the best relationship is one in which your love for each other exceeds your need for each other.

author: Toni Morrison
quote: You are your best thing.

author: Tony Robbins
quote: We can change our lives. We can do, have, and be exactly what we wish.

author: Benjamin Franklin
quote: While we may not be able to control all that happens to us, we can control what happens inside us.

author: Estee Lauder
quote: I didn't get there by wishing for it or hoping for it, but by working for it.

author: Naval Ravikant
quote: This is such a short and precious life that it's really important that you don't spend it being unhappy.

author: Sun Tzu
quote: The opportunity of defeating the enemy is provided by the enemy himself.

author: Theodore Roosevelt
quote: Nothing in this world is worth having or worth doing unless it means effort, pain, difficulty.

author: Sydney Smith
quote: We know nothing of tomorrow, our business is to be good and happy today.

author: Jon Kabat-Zinn
quote: The real meditation is how you live your life.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: Do what you feel in your heart to be right - for you'll be criticized anyway.

author: Ming-Dao Deng
quote: In nature there is no alienation. Everything belongs.

author: John Eliot
quote: We must not sit down and wait for miracles. Up and be going!

author: Gary Keller
quote: It is not that we have too little time to do all the things we need to do , it is that we feel the need to do too many things in the time we have.

author: Conrad Hilton
quote: Success seems to be connected to action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.

author: J.R.R. Tolkien
quote: I will not walk backward in life.

author: Charles Dickens
quote: Change begets change. Nothing propagates so fast.

author: Aristotle
quote: It is not enough to win a war; it is more important to organize the peace.

author: Pablo Picasso
quote: Inspiration exists, but it has to find you working.

author: Albus Dumbledore
quote: It's the unknown we fear when we look upon death and darkness, nothing more.

author: John D. Rockefeller
quote: Singleness of purpose is one of the chief essentials for success in life, no matter what may be one's aim.

author: Alexandre Dumas
quote: Often we pass beside happiness without seeing it, without looking at it, or even if we have seen and looked at it, without recognizing it.

author: Sonia Ricotti
quote: Opportunity comes when you continually push forward.

author: Alan Watts
quote: The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance.

author: Adi Da Samraj
quote: Fear of death is fear of surrender to Infinity. Learn to surrender, to exist at Infinity while alive, and fear of death dissolves.

author: Alexander Graham Bell
quote: When one door closes another door opens.

author: Helen Keller
quote: Life is either a daring adventure, or it is nothing.

author: James Allen
quote: Men are anxious to improve their circumstances but are unwilling to improve themselves; they therefore remain bound.

author: James Matthew Barrie
quote: Nothing is really work unless you would rather be doing something else.

author: Mary Engelbreit
quote: Life's too mysterious to take too serious.

author: Jonathan Swift
quote: To get angry is like to revenge yourself for the guilt of others.

author: Norman Vincent Peale
quote: The world would go on even without you. Don't take yourself so seriously.
